quote: One of the most well-known CNN architectures in semantic segmentation is the U-net, which has achieved much success in several medical image segmentation applications.
we will work towards automated segmentation of medical images, where ensembles of deep neural networks will be studied at a more rigorous level and generalized (possibly).
we have shown that a lightweight model of BUSU-Net is able to obtain much better results than recent state-of-the-art networks on some evaluation metrics.
we can obtain overall better performance than that of a single network and that of two superimposed networks of equal depths.
LadderNet: Multi-path networks based on U-Net for medical image segmentation.
